column4: I haven't tried to use synthesizer apps for many years, but I remmember way back when being able to use pretty powerful apps (cakewalk etc) on my now way way old machine (and windows). Now (as then) I have a pretty decent machine for the times, but when I attempt (at least in linux, havent tried in windows (dont have it installed)) to use these types of apps its a pain because i get breaking...
...up and sound problems like crackling etc...
that may be a driver issue, unfortunately.  What sound system is the program using?
apparently most of the ones i want to use are jack
